meanings.definition: A person with whom one communicates via email or other electronic means.
meanings.sent1: My keypals and I chat online every day.
meanings.sent2: I have a few keypals from different countries.
meanings.sent3: My keypals and I joke around in our emails.
meanings.sent4: Having keypals is like having pen pals, but online.
meanings.sent5: I treasure the friendships I've made with my keypals.

meanings.definition: The act of corresponding with someone electronically as a form of friendship or educational exchange.
meanings.sent1: Keypals help us learn about different cultures.
meanings.sent2: My class is participating in a keypals program this semester.
meanings.sent3: Exchanging emails with keypals makes learning fun.
meanings.sent4: The keypals initiative promotes global understanding.
meanings.sent5: I look forward to connecting with my keypals every week.
